titulo: Te quiero, mamá [I Love My Mommy]
descripcion:
From Susie Jaramillo and the Emmy-nominated, award-winning bilingual preschool series Canticos, comes I Love My Mommy, a book with irresistible art and uplifting rhymes, perfect for Mother's Day, Valentine's Day or any occasion that celebrates our love for our moms.
Why I love my mommy, you should really know.
She’s something really special, and I love her so.
Mommy is so patient, she does a thousand things.
She snuggles all her chickies gently with her wings.
Follow Kiki, Nicky, and Ricky—three little sibling chicks—as they prepare gifts and breakfast for Mama Hen to thank her for loving and taking care of them. They make a bit of a mess along the way, but at least their little hearts are in the right place.
I Love My Mommy is also available in Spanish.
Canticos, la serie prescolar bilingüe, presenta “Te Quiero, Mama”, un libro ilustrado para niños pequeños, lleno de arte irresistible y rima inspiradora. Este libro es perfecto para el Dia de las Madres, el Dia de San Valentín, o cualquier ocasión que celebra el amor de nuestras madres.
A Macmillan Audio production from Roaring Brook Press.
